price: 23. Qofkii gaalooba yey ku murugo gelin gaalnimadiisu, waa Xaggayaga meel noqodkoodu, Waxaana u sheegi waxay faleen. Hubaal Alle waa Ogsoon yahay waxa ku jira laabaha (dadka).
arabic: وَمَن كَفَرَ فَلَا يَحۡزُنكَ كُفۡرُهُۥٓۚ إِلَيۡنَا مَرۡجِعُهُمۡ فَنُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا عَمِلُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waman kafara falā yaḥzunka kuf'ruhu ilaynā marjiʿuhum fanunabbi-uhum bimā ʿamilū inna al-laha ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
